abstract: Many of the best rugby players from so-called Tier 2 countries who often join clubs in best European leagues cannot participate in Rugby World Cup because of contract specifications.
lead_paragraph: Stars from so-called Tier 2 rugby nations often join clubs in the best European leagues and sign deals prohibiting them from playing in international tournaments.

headline.main: Yearning to Play in the Rugby World Cup, but Forbidden by a Contract
headline.print_headline: Yearning to Play at World Cup, Some Stars Are Forbidden by Contracts

snippet: Stars from so-called Tier 2 rugby nations often join clubs in the best European leagues and sign deals prohibiting them from playing in international tournaments.
